column2: Since our inception in the industry, we are involved in manufacturing, trading, exporting, and supplying high-quality Methyl Sodium Succinate Injection. The offered medication is given into a vein or directly into a muscle as a slow injection and the dosage is prescribed by the doctor. It contains Methylprednisolone Sodium Succinate as the active drug that belongs to the family of corticosteroid hormone and is administered when a very fast response is needed or when a similar drug cannot be taken by mouth. Methyl Sodium Succinate Injection is administered alone as well as in combination with other medicines. Indicated For: Skin/kidney/intestinal/lung diseases Immune system disorder Arthritis and blood disorders Each vial contains : Methyl Prednisolone Sodium Succinate USP eq to Methyl Prednisolone ---------500mg,1000mg Methyl Prednisolone Sodium Succinate USP eq to Methyl Prednisolone ---------500mg,1000mg Excipients------------------------------q.s

column1: PUSAN BIORESEARCH ENTERPRISES Vile Parle(E), Mumbai,Maharashtra,India
column2: Having extensive knowledge of the domain, we are involved in manufacturing exporting and supplying Human Menopausal Gonadotropin Injection. The offered injection contains menotropin that is a hormonally active medication and is used for the treatment of fertility disturbances. It is usually administered in combination with another hormone and helps the one in becoming pregnant by bringing about the growth and release of a mature egg (ovulation). Human Menopausal Gonadotropin Injection provides two hormones- follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) and luteinizing hormone (LH) that help stimulate healthy ovaries to make eggs. Key Points: Intra muscular injection Optimum purity Precise composition

column2: Our company is known for manufacturing, trading, exporting, and supplying high-quality Meropenem Injection 1Gm. column2: We are a renowned name in the industry as the manufacturer, trader, exporter, and supplier of Rabeprazole Sodium Injection BP 20 mg. this injection contains Rabeprazole Sodium as active drug that belongs to the family of proton pump inhibitor (PPI). It is used to reduce stomach acid and is used for the treatment of gastro esophageal reflux disease. Some minor and temporary side effects like rash or itching, diarrhea, stomach upset, sore throat, headache, or insomnia may occur. The dosage of Rabeprazole Sodium Injection BP 20 mg is prescribed by doctor and one must consult in case of pregnancy or breast-feeding. Key Points: Do not overdose Sterile packaging Free from contamination and toxicity

column1: PUSAN BIORESEARCH ENTERPRISES Vile Parle(E), Mumbai,Maharashtra,India
column2: Being an eminent organization, we are engaged in offering a wide range of healthy Omeprazole injections. The offered injections contain Omeprazole as the active drug that is the member of proton pump inhibitor drug family. They are administered into the vein or muscle for the treatment of gastric or duodenal ulcers, gastro esophageal reflux disease, erosive esophagitis, stomach infections, and hyper secretory conditions. Omeprazole injections reduce the production of stomach acid and can also be given in combination with antibiotics to treat the gastric ulcer. Key Points: Irreversibly block the actions of an enzyme responsible for acid production Helpful in decreasing the amount of acid produced in the stomach No side effects Omeprazole injections Each vial contains : Omeprazole Sodium (sterile) eq to Omeprazole ------------------- 40mg

column2: Our company is the leading manufacturer, exporter, trader, and supplier of pure quality Tigecycline Injection 50Mg. It contains Tigecycline as active drug that belongs to the tetracycline class of antibacterial medication. The offered injection is used for the treatment of various serious infections and will not work for colds, flu, or other viral infections. Tigecycline Injection 50Mg is available in powder for that is mixed with fluid and injected into a vein. It is composed precisely and the dosage is taken as prescribed by the doctor. Precautions: Keep away from direct sunlight and store in cool place Do not overdose Keep away from the direct reach of children

column2: Backed by years of industry experience, we are engaged in offering a wide range of Enoxaparin Sodium injection USP. The offered injection is an anticoagulant medication that is given by injection just under the skin or into a vein. It is administered for the prevention and treatment of deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism during pregnancy or surgery. Enoxaparin Sodium injection USP is used in combination with aspirin and warfarin for prevention of complications from angina (chest pain), heart attacks and treatment of blood clots in leg. Key Points: Accurate formulation Extended shelf life Optimum purity Each pre-filled syringe contains: Enoxaparin Sodium USP.---------------20mg Water for Injection USP.--------------qs

column2: To cater the various demands of our clients, we are involved in manufacturing, trading, and supplying Heparin Sodium Injections. These injections are formulated with precise composition of Heparin Sodium and are used for the treatment or prevention of clots formation in the veins, arteries, lungs, or heart. They are the anticoagulant medication that works by stopping the clots from forming or getting bigger. Heparin Sodium Injections are also helpful in prevention of clotting during blood transfusions, bypass surgery, dialysis, open-heart surgery, or in patients who are confined to bed. Key Points: Used in low doses Helps to keep blood flowing smoothly For injection use only Each ml contains: Heparin Sodium BP-------------1000 IU Water for Injections BP--------------q. s.
